オプション1: A few hours later, in the evening, Star Man awoke from the intense pain throughout his body. He was overwhelmed by an exhaustion he'd never felt before—his throat was parched, his head throbbed, and his skin burned.
Star Man remembered how he had arrived on this island, clinging to the wreckage.
(I caught a glimpse before I collapsed, but it didn't feel like anyone was here...)
The thought made Star Man feel even worse.
